thread.title: Canadian dog owner films 'lion' wandering public park | Weird News
thread.title_full: Canadian dog owner films 'lion' wandering public park | Weird News | ArcaMax Publishing

author: arcamax.com
title: Canadian dog owner films 'lion' wandering public park | Weird News
text:
DELTA, British Columbia (UPI) -- A British Columbia man shared video taken in a public park when he sighted a "lion" -- actually his pit bull disguised for Halloween.
Ken Wiesner posted a video to YouTube from his recent visit to Burns Bog park in Delta, where he captured footage that appeared to show a lion wandering from behind.
The "lion" eventually turns around and is revealed to be Wiesner's pit bull, which has a similar fur color to a real lion and is wearing a fake mane as a disguise.
Wiesner's two dogs previously made viral waves when a friend recorded them catching salmon with their mouths at a river.
